Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Wonderful fond with lots of food options. Hot or cold food is available.

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Cosy place with super delicious food and such a nice owner!! Highly recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: The owner is always warm and inviting. I eat the at least once a week. The selection changes daily and there are always healthy options. The food is delicious. Love this place!

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Not cheap but... very well prepared hygienic delicious food!

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Excellent food, very relaxed and pleasant atmosphere and lovely, personal customer experience from the owner. The food is nothing magical, just good ingredients with well balanced composition of tastes. I had a meat/stew that wasn't on the menu, but tasted amazing

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: I really wanted to try their sandwiches, but they don't accept VISA cards unfortunately so I couldn't pay.

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Lovely home made cooking. Good to eat here or take home. Happy finding. Ended up by accident for a late lunch and had a very happy surprise with their heart-warming home made food. I'll be back ;-)

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Lovely owner, tidy place & great fresh food. Rotating menu with new surprises every so often. Also plenty vegetarian/vegan options. A bit away from the beaten path, but worth the venture.

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text:
Great food and drinks with an amazingly friendly owner. The atmosphere is nice and relaxed. My favourite place to get some lunch with friends.
I would highly recommend the freshly squeezed pear juice.

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Vlado is a great chef who is able to prepare delicious food from all the world. He is also a nice person to meet and talk. Good prices as well... a diamond in Bolo!

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Excellent food,  great owner and the best cheesecake I've ever had. Loved  the place very much. Feels like home. Will be back for sure. Soon. :)

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text:
Very tasty food, cooked daily in the location by the owner of the place.

The menu changes often, and the food is quite interesting with Mediterranean influences.

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Delicious, great prices, friendly owner, best cafe and deli for take out or eating in the neighborhood. A must visit in Bos en Lommer!

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Cozy nice coffee shop with the best Chai Latte I have ever tried.

Name: Hartje Bos
Review Text: Delicious food and great products!
